events.message: I received the wrong jacket in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to their request for money back.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket.
Hello! I’m Lisa from Customer Support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong jacket you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the jacket you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is #452179 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong jacket that was delivered.
Thank you for the info. We will issue a full refund and provide a prepaid shipping label so you can return the incorrect jacket.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the refund process being set up.
The refund has been processed and a return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if the return shipment went smoothly.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday and returned the jacket this morning. Thanks for the great support!
We’re glad everything worked out. Closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need help again.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We welcome your feedback regarding your recent refund experience.
